subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Zach Schilawski’s fifth goal of the season, a header on a cross from Shalrie Joseph, gave the New England Revolution a 3-2 victory over the short-handed Red Bulls in Foxborough, Mass.
snippet: Zach Schilawski’s fifth goal of the season, a header on a cross from Shalrie Joseph, gave the New England Revolution a 3-2 victory over the short-handed Red Bulls in Foxborough, Mass.
